name: Docker
headline: Software development platform.
description: Docker is the world’s leading software container platform. Developers use Docker to eliminate “works on my machine” problems when collaborating on code with co-workers. Operators use Docker to run and manage apps side-by-side in isolated containers to get better compute density. Enterprises use Docker to build agile software delivery pipelines to ship new features faster, more securely and with confidence for both Linux and Windows Server apps.

# Develop faster. Run anywhere.
Build with the [#1 most-used developer tool](http://docker.com/</blog/docker-stack-overflow-survey-thank-you-2023/>)
Download Docker Desktop
[![Mac icon](http://docker.com/app/themes/Ponyo-divi-child/dist/images/icons/download-icon-apple.png)Download for Mac - Intel Chip](http://docker.com/<https:/desktop.docker.com/mac/main/amd64/Docker.dmg?utm_source=docker&utm_medium=webreferral&utm_campaign=dd-smartbutton&utm_location=module>)

## What is Docker?
### Accelerate how you build, share, and run applications
Docker helps developers build, share, run, and verify applications anywhere — without tedious environment configuration or management.
![Icon build](http://docker.com/app/uploads/2024/02/icon-build.svg)
[Build](http://docker.com/<#build>)
![Icon share](http://docker.com/app/uploads/2024/02/icon-share.svg)
[Share](http://docker.com/<#share>)
![Icon run](http://docker.com/app/uploads/2024/02/icon-run.svg)
[Run](http://docker.com/<#run>)
![Icon verify](http://docker.com/app/uploads/2024/02/icon-verify.svg)
[Verify](http://docker.com/<#verify>)
![Icon test](http://docker.com/app/uploads/2024/09/icon-beaker-02.svg)
[Test](http://docker.com/<#test>)
#### Build
##### Spin up new environments quickly
Accelerate your development by building Docker images locally or in the cloud with Docker Build Cloud. Create multiple containers using Docker Compose without the hassle of local build constraints.
##### Integrate with your existing tools
Docker seamlessly integrates with your development tools, such as VS Code, CircleCI, and GitHub. Meanwhile, Docker Build Cloud fast-tracks build times, resulting in an enhanced workflow without disruption.
##### Containerize applications for consistency
Ensure consistent application performance across any environment, whether it’s on-premises Kubernetes or cloud platforms like AWS ECS, Azure ACI, and Google GKE.
[Optimize builds with Docker Build Cloud](http://docker.com/</products/build-cloud/>)
![home tab build](https://www.docker.com/app/uploads/2024/09/home-tab-build.png)
#### Share
##### Discover and manage container images with Docker Hub
Explore Docker Hub, the world’s largest registry, where you can discover, distribute, store, and serve cloud-native components, including container images. Access a vast repository of trusted content from verified publishers and Docker Official Images.
##### Collaborate with your team seamlessly
Easily pull and publish images from Docker Hub to streamline sharing within your team, organization, or the broader community. Docker Hub simplifies the management and distribution of container applications.
##### Ensure security and trust with Docker Hub
Secure your workspaces with robust image access management, registry access controls, and private repositories. Docker Hub offers a secure and trusted marketplace for your container images, ensuring best practices and peace of mind.
[Discover Docker Hub](http://docker.com/</products/docker-hub/%20>)
![home tab share](https://www.docker.com/app/uploads/2024/09/home-tab-share.png)
#### Run
##### Develop secure, modern applications with Docker Desktop
Docker Desktop simplifies and accelerates the development of secure, containerized applications. Gain speed through streamlined containerized development and ensure secure workflows with robust security measures that protect your code throughout the development lifecycle.
##### Flexible and integrated development environment
Docker Desktop provides a local environment for efficient building and testing of containerized applications. It supports a wide range of programming languages and integrates seamlessly with various developer tools, including Docker Hub for pre-built components, Docker Scout for security scanning, and third-party tools.
##### Streamline your development workflow
Effortlessly manage your applications with Docker Desktop’s pre-configured templates and easy integration with image registries and CI/CD pipelines. This comprehensive platform supports both individual developers and organizations, offering a secure and flexible environment for the entire application lifecycle.
[Start with Docker Desktop](http://docker.com/</products/docker-desktop/%20>)
![home tab run](https://www.docker.com/app/uploads/2024/09/home-tab-run.png)
#### Verify
##### Enhance security with Docker Scout
Docker Scout is a secure software supply chain solution designed to provide actionable insights for container images. It helps teams evaluate security and compliance policies, ensuring a robust security posture.
##### Increase transparency and visibility
Gain insights and context into your components, libraries, tools, and processes with Docker Scout. This increased transparency helps you understand and manage the software supply chain effectively.
##### Proactively address security concerns
Docker Scout detects and highlights security issues, offering suggestions for remediation based on policy violations and state changes. Ensure your application security by addressing concerns before they impact production.
[Explore Docker Scout](http://docker.com/</products/docker-scout/%20>)
![home tab verify](https://www.docker.com/app/uploads/2024/09/home-tab-verify.png)
#### Test
##### Test dependencies as code
Eliminate the need for mocks and complex environment configurations by defining your test dependencies as code. Simply run your tests, and Docker containers will be created and deleted as needed.
##### Unit tests with real dependencies
Utilize Testcontainers to provide lightweight, throwaway instances of databases, message brokers, web browsers, and more. Test anything that can be containerized for accurate, reliable testing.
##### Integrate and automate with ease
Efficiently run data access layer integration tests, UI/acceptance tests, and application integration tests using containerized instances. Enjoy a clean, consistent testing environment with minimal setup.
[Check out Testcontainers ](http://docker.com/<https:/testcontainers.com/>)
![home tab test](https://www.docker.com/app/uploads/2024/09/home-tab-test.png)
[Explore all ](http://docker.com/</products/>)
[Find pricing](http://docker.com/</pricing/>)
## Why use Docker?
### Trusted by developers. Chosen by Fortune 100 companies.
Docker provides a suite of development tools, services, trusted content, and automations, used individually or together, to accelerate the delivery of secure applications.
[Read more customer stories](http://docker.com/</customer-stories/>)

## What is Docker?
### Accelerate how you build, share, and run applications
Docker helps developers build, share, run, and verify applications anywhere — without tedious environment configuration or management.
![Icon build⟨58⟩]
Build⟨59⟩
![Icon share⟨60⟩]
Share⟨61⟩
![Icon run⟨62⟩]
Run⟨63⟩
![Icon verify⟨64⟩]
Verify⟨65⟩
![Icon test⟨66⟩]
Test⟨67⟩
#### Build
##### Spin up new environments quickly
Accelerate your development by building Docker images locally or in the cloud with Docker Build Cloud. Create multiple containers using Docker Compose without the hassle of local build constraints.
##### Integrate with your existing tools
Docker seamlessly integrates with your development tools, such as VS Code, CircleCI, and GitHub. Meanwhile, Docker Build Cloud fast-tracks build times, resulting in an enhanced workflow without disruption.
##### Containerize applications for consistency
Ensure consistent application performance across any environment, whether it’s on-premises Kubernetes or cloud platforms like AWS ECS, Azure ACI, and Google GKE.
Optimize builds with Docker Build Cloud⟨68⟩
![home tab build⟨69⟩]
#### Share
##### Discover and manage container images with Docker Hub
Explore Docker Hub, the world’s largest registry, where you can discover, distribute, store, and serve cloud-native components, including container images. Access a vast repository of trusted content from verified publishers and Docker Official Images.
##### Collaborate with your team seamlessly
Easily pull and publish images from Docker Hub to streamline sharing within your team, organization, or the broader community. Docker Hub simplifies the management and distribution of container applications.
##### Ensure security and trust with Docker Hub
Secure your workspaces with robust image access management, registry access controls, and private repositories. Docker Hub offers a secure and trusted marketplace for your container images, ensuring best practices and peace of mind.
Discover Docker Hub⟨70⟩
![home tab share⟨71⟩]
#### Run
##### Develop secure, modern applications with Docker Desktop
Docker Desktop simplifies and accelerates the development of secure, containerized applications. Gain speed through streamlined containerized development and ensure secure workflows with robust security measures that protect your code throughout the development lifecycle.
##### Flexible and integrated development environment
Docker Desktop provides a local environment for efficient building and testing of containerized applications. It supports a wide range of programming languages and integrates seamlessly with various developer tools, including Docker Hub for pre-built components, Docker Scout for security scanning, and third-party tools.
##### Streamline your development workflow
Effortlessly manage your applications with Docker Desktop’s pre-configured templates and easy integration with image registries and CI/CD pipelines. This comprehensive platform supports both individual developers and organizations, offering a secure and flexible environment for the entire application lifecycle.
Start with Docker Desktop⟨72⟩
![home tab run⟨73⟩]
#### Verify
##### Enhance security with Docker Scout
Docker Scout is a secure software supply chain solution designed to provide actionable insights for container images. It helps teams evaluate security and compliance policies, ensuring a robust security posture.
##### Increase transparency and visibility
Gain insights and context into your components, libraries, tools, and processes with Docker Scout. This increased transparency helps you understand and manage the software supply chain effectively.
##### Proactively address security concerns
Docker Scout detects and highlights security issues, offering suggestions for remediation based on policy violations and state changes. Ensure your application security by addressing concerns before they impact production.
Explore Docker Scout⟨74⟩
![home tab verify⟨75⟩]
#### Test
##### Test dependencies as code
Eliminate the need for mocks and complex environment configurations by defining your test dependencies as code. Simply run your tests, and Docker containers will be created and deleted as needed.
##### Unit tests with real dependencies
Utilize Testcontainers to provide lightweight, throwaway instances of databases, message brokers, web browsers, and more. Test anything that can be containerized for accurate, reliable testing.
##### Integrate and automate with ease
Efficiently run data access layer integration tests, UI/acceptance tests, and application integration tests using containerized instances. Enjoy a clean, consistent testing environment with minimal setup.

generated_description:
**Docker: Streamlining Software Development**

Docker is the world’s leading software container platform, aimed at making software development more agile, efficient, and secure. Founded as part of Y Combinator’s Batch S10 and headquartered in San Francisco, Docker has evolved into a critical tool for developers, operators, and enterprises alike.

**Mission and Vision:**
Docker's primary mission is simple: eliminate the notorious "it works on my machine" issue that developers commonly face. By using Docker's platform, developers can work collaboratively across various systems—whether they're running on Linux or Windows Server. For operators, it means managing applications in isolated containers, enhancing compute density and resource efficiency. Enterprises leverage Docker to create agile delivery pipelines, releasing new features more quickly, securely, and confidently.

**The Team and Background:**
With a dedicated team of around 201 employees, Docker is not just a tech company; it's a thriving community that encourages collaboration and innovation in software development. Although specific founding dates weren't mentioned, the company's roots in Y Combinator signify its potential from the start.

**Products and Offerings:**
Docker provides a suite of powerful products and tools, including:
- **Docker Desktop:** The go-to tool for containerizing applications.
- **Docker Hub:** A large registry for discovering and sharing container images.
- **Docker Scout:** It simplifies the software supply chain while ensuring security and compliance.
- **Docker Build Cloud:** This feature accelerates image builds to streamline development processes.
- **Testcontainers:** Both Desktop and Cloud options allow for local testing with actual dependencies.

Resources for developers are abundant, including extensive documentation, training resources, and an active community forum.

**Growth and Recognition:**
Docker has carved out a significant market presence. It's used by over 20 million developers monthly, supports over 7 million applications, and manages around 20 billion image pulls each month. Trusted by fortune 100 companies, Docker stands out as a leading choice for modern application development.

**Community and Support:**
Docker fosters a vibrant community via meetups and online platforms. They also have an open-source program aimed at supporting developers working on non-commercial projects.

**Conclusion:**
For developers looking to build, share, run, and test applications seamlessly, Docker is a compelling solution. With its focus on enhancing productivity and security while reducing complexity, it stands out as both a tool and a platform worthy of consideration. To dive deeper into Docker’s offerings or to get started, visit their website at [docker.com](http://docker.com).
